Title: Building a Real-Time Task Priority System: A Journey Through Stacks, Queues, and Priority Queues
Description: I created a real-time task priority system to learn when best to use stacks, queues and priority queues

Title: From Code to Cloud: Building Your First CI/CD Pipeline with Health Checks and Monitoring
Description: I created a simple app to test out CI/CD concepts, build pipelines, docker containerization, deployment strategies, health checks, application logging and observability.

Title: Why Is My App Slow? A Detective Story
Description: This post explores profiling and benchmarking, database query optimization, lazy loading vs eager loading, caching strategies and async patterns.

Title: The Art of the Code Review
Description: This post covers code reviews, giving and recieving feedback, asking effective questions, documentation and technical writing

Title: Designing Forms for Everyone
Description: This post covers accessibility, form design best practices, user feedback and validation, loading states and error handling, visual hierarchy, colour theory and contrast and usability testing.
